description.en: Town of Salem is a browser-based game that challenges players on their ability to convincingly lie as well as detect when other players are lying.
description.ga_IE: Is cluiche Brabhsálaí-bhunaithe é baile Salem a thugann dúshlán do na himreoirí ar a gcumas luí go dílis chomh maith le braitheadh nuair a bhíonn imreoirí eile ina luí.
